    • play

      public void play(PlayerChoicesDataStructure playerChoices) throws UnknownStateException
      Executes the play action based on the current state of the game. This method handles different states and performs the corresponding actions such as throwing dices, starting a meteorite attack, or checking the shipboard after an attack.
      Specified by:
      play in class AdventureCard
      Parameters:
      playerChoices - the player's decisions or choices required for specific actions during the play, such as defending against a meteorite attack.
      Throws:
      UnknownStateException - if the current state of the game is unrecognized or invalid.

    • toClientCard

      public ClientCard toClientCard()
      Converts the current MeteoriteStorm instance into a ClientCard representation. This method maps the server-side meteorite details to client-side objects.
      Specified by:
      toClientCard in class AdventureCard
      Returns:
      a ClientMeteoriteStorm object containing the name, image, and a list of ClientDangerousObjects corresponding to the meteorites in this MeteoriteStorm.

    • convertIdsToMeteorites

      public void convertIdsToMeteorites()
      Transforms a list of meteorite IDs into a list of meteorite objects. Each ID from the meteoriteIDs field is processed through a callable object retrieved from meteoriteCreator, which generates the corresponding meteorite object. The resulting list of meteorites is then set to the meteorites field. Additionally, an iterator for the newly created list of meteorites is assigned to the meteoriteIterator field. The method handles any exceptions that occur during the execution of the callable by wrapping and rethrowing them as RuntimeExceptions. This method is intended to convert and initialize meteorites from their respective string-based identifiers.

    • setMeteoriteID

      public void setMeteoriteID(List<String> meteoriteID)
      Sets the list of meteorite IDs for the current meteorite storm.
      Parameters:
      meteoriteID - the list of meteorite IDs to be assigned to this meteorite storm

    • setMeteorites

      public void setMeteorites(List<Meteorite> meteorites)
      Sets the list of meteorites for the current instance and initializes the meteorite iterator.
      Parameters:
      meteorites - the list of meteorites to be assigned. Cannot be null and should contain valid Meteorite objects.
